entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS 17.4 p1 Marking files as readonly #63340
  • Investigate `indent_size` not respected for first project file and on formatting #63334
  • IntelliSense shows wrong type for multi-targeted fields with #ifdefs #63331
  • EditorConfig Value Holder #63329
  • ref modifiers within __arglist() are ignored in invocation escape analysis #63325
    17.4
  • Enable incremental member edit analysis by default #63324
    17.4

Closed

  • 'required' isn't offered in records #62421
    17.4
  • VS 2022 & VS 2019 Color Scheme Change in Settings of one version of VS causes the same change in another VS version! #63337
  • When migrating dotnet/runtime repo to Roslyn that shipped with 17.4 preview 1 Roslyn crashes with NotImplementedException #63335
  • Correctness-determinism failure caused by R2R image of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.InteractiveHost.dll #63145
    17.4
  • Is it possible for a [Generator] to add attributes to a property / field / method / property? #63316
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32810.320 #63322

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Merge pull request #61568 from CyrusNajmabadi/localFuncindexing" #63344
    Area-IDE
  • Update the job names used in report ci times script #63343
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't provide refactoring for VB Move Static Members when IncompleteMemberSyntax is found #63342
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade LSP version #63341
    Area-IDE
  • Change the search of local function to non-recursive version #63338
    Area-IDE
  • Demo change #63326
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix required completion in records #63330
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #63336
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Backport some integration test skips to 17.3 #63300
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use the correct option for splitting comments #62680
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63323
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63321
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow passing a reference type field by reference when spilling to temps #63345
    Area-Compilers
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #63197
    Area-IDE
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers
